column4: how do you change channels i forget for irc ? I need a better irc client any sujesstions ?
multi connections routing to the internet is not a good idea, why do you want two ?
so I can test to see if the USB wireless is working or can work at all
disconnect your cable to test it
I need it to work on a differn't machine across the house so i can install ubuntu and plug it in and know it's going to work
ok - so why do you need both connections active at the same time to test it ?
as soon as you plug it in and it works your routing will be messed up and it will kill both connections
hence why you need to test with one connection at a time
ok so uplug the cable and boot up ?
with the usb key in, yes

that dumb usb adapter trennet thing never got picked up on boot I have to put the MAC Address in the router anyway I wanted to see if it would pickup the device and it did but labled it somthing differn't
is there like a plug in and not worry about configuration for hardware webpage
